title: Subdomain Takeover At the Main Domain Of Your Site

profile.name: Sifchain
profile.about: The world's first omni-chain decentralized exchange

vulnerability_information:
Hello,

I Know that isn't in the Scope But this The Only Way I can Report With And This Issue Is Very High It Belongs to the Main Domain 
this is pretty serious security issue in some context, so please act as fast as possible.

##overview 
 the  Main Domain [sifchain.finance] is pointing to wix.com, which has unclaimed CNAME record. ANYONE is able to own http://sifchain.finance domain at the moment.
This vulnerability is called subdomain takeover. You can read more about it here:
https://blog.sweepatic.com/subdomain-takeover-principles/
https://hackerone.com/reports/32825
https://hackerone.com/reports/175070
https://hackerone.com/reports/172137

## Steps To Reproduce:
Visit >> https://sifchain.finance

when you open the above Link you will find wix.com subdomain error if you have an account in wix.com "premium" you can take over this subdomain
I don't try it manually because I haven't permission to test this issue and i haven't the Premuim Account . 

##Mitigation:
 Remove the CNAME record from  sifchain.finance  DNS zone completely.
Or renew the Subscription .  

Regards,

Ahmed Elmalky

## Impact

Very Critical It is In the Main Domain . 
Subdomain takeover is abused for several purposes:
    Authentication bypass
Malware distribution
Phishing / Spear phishing
XSS

activities.message: I have inspected our DNS entries, and I see nothing there pointing to wix.com.  Could you please document where you are seeing a DNS entry pointing to wix?

I couldn't see the DNs Record of you site i just the wix error 
    http://sifchain.finance/
{F1287512}


this is Example From H1 
https://hackerone.com/reports/996956

Can you review this resource too ? 
https://support.wix.com/en/article/connecting-a-subdomain-to-a-site-in-your-wix-account
i decided to close the report because i am afraid from you close as N/a and lose Points

Yes, we temporarily used Wix a while back.  I am aware of no current DNS records pointing to Wix, and I checked.  I don't believe this is true reproducible vulnerability unless that is the case.  If my information is inaccurate, please let me know.
if i paid the premuim subscription i will try to claim it .
Another hacker reported this, and after a few tries I was able to reproduce the problem.
I believe I have fixed the problem in our DNS settings (there was one entry that was wrong).  Please let me know if you can reproduce the problem anymore.

There is no 404 error now 
I think it's resolved now .

Hello
 thanks About the 50$ 
but what about the real bounty this vulnerability is high and i am the first reporter .

If you read our policy, anything that doesn't risk our actual blockchain is automatically considered low severity.  Additionally, actually claiming the domains on Wix would have required verification to do so, which could not have occurred without controlling our DNS entries.  You also didn't share enough information for me to realize the problem.  You will be awarded a bounty soon.

i share all the Possible Information but you don't understand the vulnerability Well And i bought the Premium Account but find it resolved . 
and the Vulnerability Not Low it High  Please rethink About that . 
thank you and i am  waiting the bounty :) .
I am awarding our standard amount for Low severity issues, which is what this is according to our policy statement.
Ok sir thanks you very much about the bounty i am very happy to help you to close issue like that .
